Question: At age 67, this person became a first-time dad when Stringfield gave birth to a baby girl in December 2012.
Hints: This person also appeared in a remake of the comedy Father of the Bride in 1991 (followed by a sequel in 1995).
This person was raised in Inglewood, California, and then later in Garden Grove, California, in a Baptist family.
This person has been an avid art collector since 1968, when he bought a print by the Los Angeles artist Ed Ruscha.
